pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Multinomial Logistic Normal Regression // Provides methods for fitting and inspection of Bayesian Multinomial Logistic Normal Models using MAP estimation and Laplace Approximation as developed in Silverman et. Al. (2022) https://www.jmlr.org/papers/v23/19-882.html. Key functionality is implemented in C++ for scalability. 'fido' replaces the previous package 'stray'.
